title: Expanding replay, changing overtime and more with John Breech (Football 1/22)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by John Breech to break down the latest news out of the AFC and NFC Championship Games, including the rumor of Roger Goodell overturning the Rams win over the Saints (2:00), whether replay needs to be expanded to include pass interference (11:00), whether the NFL needs to change overtime rules (20:00) and the most underrated storylines they saw from Sunday's action (28:30).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
